text: Supriyaa Ram (Supriya Lohith) is an Indian playback singer born in Bengaluru. == Discography == {| class="wikitable" ! Shastry |Hemanth |- |Rang (Tulu) |Kadala poyyeda |Manikanth Kadri |Nakul Abhyankar |- |Yeregla panodchi(Tulu) |Kamala vimala |Giridhare Diwan |Solo |- |Soombe(Tulu) |Love patient |Edberg Dillon |Gurukiran |- |Are Marlere(Tulu) |Chameli |Devdas Kapikad |Solo |- |Slicon city |Bhetiyada ee ghalige |Anoop Seelin |Siddharth |- |Aa eradu varshagalu |Yarivalu gulabi |Anoop Seelin |Siddharth |- |Mosagallaku mosagadu(Telugu) |Hello Hello |Manikanth Kadri |Karthik |- |Bangari |Kannalle sanne maadi |AM Neel |Karthik |- |rowspan=2|2018 | rowspan=2|Looty |Malavalli |Dharma Vish |Nagendra |- |Khushi |Dharma Vish |Avinash Chebbi |} The song "Neenaade naa" in Murali Meets Meera was her first biggest hit Supriyaa Ram (Supriya Lohith) has recorded songs with singers such asAnkit Tiwari, Hariharan, Unni Menon, Rajesh Krishnan, Vijay Prakash, Kunal Ganjawala, Tippu, Karthik, Haricharan, Armaan Malik. Supriyaa Ram (Supriya Lohith) won the Best playback singer award by KIMA for the song Nee naade naa|Neenaade naa.https://www.99doing.com/supriyalohith/ == Awards == "SIIMA-2018" Nominee for her song “Nee nanna olavu” from the blockbuster film “Chamak” “Filmfare-2018” nominee for the song “Nee nanna olavu” from the blockbuster film “Chamak” "MMA-SOUTH" Mirchi Music Awards 2018 nominee for her song “Nee nanna olavu” from the blockbuster film “Chamak” Two time “IIFA Award” nominee for the songs Taramayya from Aatagara and Marula from Run Antony "Voice of the year-2015" award by Chithrasanthe “Best female playback singer” award by KIMA(Kannada International Music Awards) for her song Nee naade naa from Murali meets Meera Winner of "Voice of Bangalore-Season 1" Winner of “Zee kannada|Zee kannada Saregamapa" season-2 conducted by ZEE Kannada channel Winner of "Breakout festival-Australia conducted by ANZ in Melbourne-Australia "Times Youth" competition conducted by the Times of India-Times Group India ==References== Category:Living people Category:Indian female film singers Category:21st-century Indian singers Category:Kannada people Category:Singers from Bangalore Category:Kannada playback singers Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:21st-century Indian women singers Category:Film musicians from Karnataka Category:Women musicians from Karnataka
title: Supriya Lohith
